name: Young Red Dragon Zombie
senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 9
languages: understands Common and Draconic but can't speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon attacks once with its bite and twice with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) fire damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales a blast of fire that fills a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area makes a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw  taking 52 (15d6) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a success. A creature that fails the saving throw also suffers 5 (1d10) ongoing fire damage. While affected by this ongoing damage  it is frightened of the dragon. A creature can use an action to end the ongoing damage.

special_abilities.name: Undead Fortitude (1/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If the zombie is reduced to 0 hit points by damage that isnt radiant or from a critical hit, its instead reduced to 1 hit point, falls prone, and is stunned until the end of its next turn, appearing to be dead.

special_abilities.name: Undead Nature
special_abilities.desc: A zombie doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.
